name: Sneaky Bears VR
description:
Sneaky Bears is a quirky and fun Virtual Reality game for Google Cardboard and other 3D mobile headsets.

What do you do when the local teddy bear factory gets taken over by an evil bear turning all the cute cuddly teddy bears against you? Play Sneaky Bears to find out. This new VR action adventure game is all you need to get involved in one of the most exciting adventures of all time. Finish the game to play against your friends in the leaderboard measured “Survival mode”. This game just keeps giving...

#dontletthemcatchya

What is a Google Cardboard? A low cost virtual reality viewer which creates an immersive experience for the player. If you love fun, get in on the action.

Features:

• Innovative Gameplay
• Strong Narrative
• Fun packed action adventure
